movies.title: Ai qing amoeba
movies.plot: May lives with her three male friends, and when they are all separately fired from their jobs, she suggests they open up a bar together, and begin to examine their love lives. Tung is torn between his current and ex-girlfriend, Jim falls for a woman who only sees him as a one-night stand, May has always been in love with Jim, and Long has always had a crush on May.
movies.simplePlot: May lives with her three male friends, and when they are all separately fired from their jobs, she suggests they open up a bar together, and begin to examine their love lives. Tung is torn ...

biography.bio: Eric Kot was born on December 30, 1966 in Hong Kong as Kot Man-Fai. He is an actor and director, known for You Shoot, I Shoot (2001), July Rhapsody (2002) and Butterfly (2004).
biography.name: Eric Kot

biography.bio: Amanda Lee was born on October 4, 1970 in Hong Kong as Wai-Man Lee. She is an actress, known for Full Alert (1997), Shanghaï grand (1996) and 9413 (1998).
biography.name: Amanda Lee

biography.bio: Andy Chi-On Hui was born on August 12, 1967 in Hong Kong, China. He is an actor, known for Swallowtail Butterfly (1996), Koma (2004) and Give Them a Chance (2003). He is married to Sammi Cheng.
biography.name: Andy Chi-On Hui

biography.bio: Julian Cheung was born on August 27, 1971 in Hong Kong. He is an actor, known for B gai waak (1998), Bong ga (2007) and Chuet sik san tau (2001). He is married to Anita Yuen. They have one child.
biography.name: Julian Cheung

biography.bio: Karen Tong was born on October 4, 1971 in Hong Kong. She is an actress, known for Running on Karma (2003), Whispers and Moans (2007) and San sam long: Foon cheung tou foo (2000).
biography.name: Karen Tong

biography.bio: Annie Wu was born on August 21, 1978 in Taiwan as Chen-Chun Wu. She is known for her work on Police Story 4: First Strike (1996), Island of Greed (1997) and Ban sheng yuan (1997).
biography.name: Annie Wu

biography.bio: Michael Tong was born on November 17, 1969 in Hong Kong as Tong Man-Lung. He is an actor, known for Man of Tai Chi (2013), Purple Storm (1999) and Lang man feng bao (1996).
biography.name: Michael Tong

biography.bio: Kar-Ying Law was born on August 27, 1947 in Guangzhou, Guangdong, China. He is known for his work on Crime story (1993), Le roi singe 1 - La boîte de Pandore (1995) and Summer Snow (1995). He has been married to Ming-Chuen Wang since May 2, 2009.
biography.name: Kar-Ying Law

biography.bio: Tat-Ming Cheung was born on July 2, 1964 in Hong Kong, British Crown Colony. He is an actor and writer, known for Espion amateur (2001), You Shoot, I Shoot (2001) and Forbidden City Cop (1996).
biography.name: Tat-Ming Cheung

biography.bio: Chi Wah Wong was born on September 5, 1960 in Hong Kong. He is an actor and writer, known for Thunderbolt (1995), Yan gaan sik seung (1996) and Yi wen ji bao biao (2002).
biography.name: Chi Wah Wong

biography.bio: Born in Taiwan, Qi Shu has won the prestigious Golden Horse Awards in Taiwan (regarded as the East Asian Oscars) for Best Supporting Actress. She has also received a nomination for Best Actress from the Golden Horse Awards. She appeared with Jackie Chan in the romantic comedy Gorgeous (1999) ("Gorgeous"). Her name is spelled in a variety of ways, including Hsu Qi, Hsu Chi, Qi Shu, and Shu Kei, and there are quite a few other variations on her name on foreign V.C.D.s, D.V.D.s, and internet sites.
biography.name: Qi Shu

biography.bio: Cher Yeung is an actress, known for Dream Lovers (1986), 3 go shou shang de jing cha (1996) and Intimates (1997).
biography.name: Cher Yeung
